content.en: Meta-analysis advancements: Researchers are developing new algorithms to improve confidence intervals in meta-analysis, making them less sensitive to publication bias. They are also working on developing models that allow for variation in heterogeneity in meta-analysis, and comparing the impact of different heterogeneity estimators on the results. Additionally, algorithms are being used to identify known methods for estimating between-study variance and its uncertainty in meta-analysis.
content.da: Fremskridt inden for meta-analyse: Forskere udvikler nye algoritmer for at forbedre konfidensintervaller i meta-analyser og gøre dem mindre følsomme over for publikationsbias. De arbejder også på at udvikle modeller, der tillader variation i heterogenitet i meta-analyser, og sammenligner virkningen af forskellige heterogenitetsestimators på resultaterne. Derudover anvendes algoritmer til at identificere kendte metoder til at estimere mellem-studie varians og dens usikkerhed i meta-analyser.
